channel.title: What's the weirdest dream you ever had?
channel.description:
[u][b]The title describes the topic[/b][/u]
I will start ,
I was just strolling in the park when i suddenly found a cat , It meowed at me and i understood it that i wants to be petted so i tried to pet it and bit my balls and it felt a bit real, Then i woke up terrified.

item.title: What's the weirdest dream you ever had?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

the dream itself wasn’t too weird. but i’ve had a few dreams repeat themselves, detail for detail. sometimes years apart. that makes it weird to me

Read full topic
item.source: What's the weirdest dream you ever had?
